original_title: Philip: The King Without a Crown
overview: A profile of the Duke of Edinburgh, exploring how he dealt with giving up his promising naval career and his surname as he took a back seat to the Queen. From his charity patronages, to founding the Duke of Edinburgh award and becoming an unlikely champion of environmental issues, his life as Britainâ€™s longest-serving royal consort has been a significant one for the entire nation.
title: Philip: The King Without a Crown
